table_caption: Basic demographic features and MR scanning protocols of the multicentre setting. Magnetic resonance data from patients with PD and healthy controls were acquired at five German sites (Dresden, Frankfurt, Marburg, Tübingen, and Ulm). DTI data were transversally recorded in interleaved even order. T2-weighed FLAIR were sagittally recorded.
table_foot: †Values are given as mean ± standard deviation (min–max).+Kruskal–Wallis analysis of variance on ranks.*Chi-square test.DTI, diffusion tensor imaging; F, female; FLAIR, fluid-attenuated inversion recovery; M, male; MR, magnetic resonance; PD, Parkinson’s disease; TE, time echo; TR, time repetition.
